name: AMLModelProfile
description: AzureML Model profiling to get optimal approximate value for CPU and memory required by container.
releaseNotes: Works with cross-platform agents (Linux, macOS, or Windows)
author: ms-air-aiagility

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure ML Workspace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Machine Learning Workspace

inputs.name: modelSourceType
inputs.label: Model Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Model Source type: Model Artifact(Release) or Manual Specify(Build/Release)

inputs.name: modelInferenceFilePath
inputs.label: Model Inference File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fully qualified path to YAML or JSON file for model inference configuration.

inputs.name: profileResultJson
inputs.label: Model Profile Result File Path(JSON)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fully qualified path to JSON file to hold model profile results.

messages.NotAFile: The given path was not to a file: '%s'.
messages.NotAJsonFile: The given file was not a JSON: '%s'.
messages.NotAYamlFile: The given file was not a YAML: '%s'.
messages.InvalidJson: The given Input Data is Invalid JSON
messages.CannotUseModelArtifact: Model Artifact can be used only in release pipeline.
